thread.title: 'X Factor' Hosts Caroline Flack And Olly Murs Reveal How They've Helped Each Other Through Love Splits
thread.title_full: 'X Factor' Hosts Caroline Flack And Olly Murs Reveal How They've Helped Each Other Through Love Splits

author: Ashley Percival
title: 'X Factor' Hosts Caroline Flack And Olly Murs Reveal How They've Helped Each Other Through Love Splits
text:
Previous Story Next Story 'X Factor' Hosts Caroline Flack And Olly Murs Reveal How They've Helped Each Other Through Love Splits The Huffington Post UK | By Ashley Percival 
Olly Murs and Caroline Flack have both suffered heartbreak this year, but the pals have revealed how they have been helping each other through their tough times. READ MORE: 
Caroline split from music manager Jack Street for the second time following a brief reunion earlier this year, while Olly split from long-term love Francesca Thomas last month . 
Olly Murs and Caroline Flack 
Now, in a joint interview in The Sun, the ‘ X Factor ’ presenters open up about how their friendship has helped them nurse their broken hearts. 
“I think it’s important to talk about that because it makes it easier. I literally did everything I could to try and get over it. I would Google things like: 'How long does this last?'" 
Of course, rumours of a romance between the pair have heightened since they both became single, but Olly recently insisted nothing would ever happen between them. 
"Me and Caroline have always said interviews we've never been together we're just really good mates,” he said during an appearance on ‘ Loose Women ’. 
" Simon Cowell is always trying to stir it up, but we're just great friends. But yeah it's been a difficult couple of weeks." MORE 'X FACTOR':
